title: No sound output
solutions: Check if correct audio device is set as default
Check if audio cables are properly connected

title: Display resolution issues
solutions: Check if monitor supports current resolution

title: Microphone not working
solutions: Check if correct input device is selected
Allow microphone access under Privacy settings
Test mic in another app or device
Try a different audio input port

title: Multiple monitor issues
solutions: Press Windows + P to cycle through display modes
Check cable connections and monitor power
Verify both monitors are powered on and set to correct input

title: Audio crackling or distortion
solutions: Lower audio format settings in sound control panel
Move away from potential interference sources (e.g., wireless routers)
Disable power-saving features on the audio device
